Meet the hiring team
Shunki Tan 
3rd
Consultant - Infrastucture, Cloud & DevOps
Job poster
Message
About the job
We are partnered with an established organisation to look for a software engineer.

Responsibilities:
Build and maintain software applications throughout their lifecycle
Develop services, APIs, web applications, and backend components
Implement, test, and support software features with clear documentation
Fix defects and improve code quality
Write secure, efficient, and clean code
Improve application performance and reliability
Work with the team on prototypes and new product ideas

Requirements
Diploma in IT
Skilled in one backend language such as .NET Core, Java Spring Boot, or Pytho
Skilled in JavaScript and a modern frontend framework like React or Angular
Hands on with Git for source control
Practical experience with relational databases such as MS SQL or PostgreSQL
Knowledge of Agile software practices
Able to work independently and collaborate with the team

About the company
Eames Consulting
279,285 followers
Follow
Staffing and Recruiting 51-200 employees 90 on LinkedIn
Eames Consulting is a specialist global recruitment business that connects ambitious professionals with forward-thinking organisations. Through deep and evolving sector knowledge, we work as long-term strategic partners – guiding businesses, shaping talent, building relationships and creating success.

Working across London, Singapore, Hong Kong, the Philippines, New York and Philadelphia, our team of over 150 recruitment experts cover mid-senior level roles in:

Change and Transformation

Technology and Digital Enablement

Corporate Functions

Specialist Disciplines

We are proud to be part of Eames Group, a multidisciplinary talent solutions group comprising Eames Consulting (specialist recruitment), Eames Partnership (executive search) and ECMS (advisory-led managed services).
